greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-2) + a(n-3), with a(0) = a(1) = 1, a(2) = 0.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,1).
formula: a(n+1)*a(n+3) = a(n)*a(n+2) + a(n+1)*a(n+2) for all n in Z.
a(n+1) + a(n-1) = A000045(n) for all n in Z.
mathematica: a[ n_] := Fibonacci[ Quotient[ n, 2] - 1] Fibonacci[ Quotient[ n, 2] + 1 + Mod[n, 2]];
CoefficientList[Series[(1 - x^2 - x^3) / (1 - x - x^3 - x^4), {x, 0, 70}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 20 2015 *)
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1,1,0,0]; [n le 4 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+Self(n-3)+Self(n-4): n in [1..50]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 20 2015
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jan 19 2014
